member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice
member.summary: Class for getting information of a camera device or operating a camera device.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.Connect(Ricoh.CameraController.DeviceInterface)
member.summary: Connect with the specified device interface.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.Disconnect(Ricoh.CameraController.DeviceInterface)
member.summary: Disconnect with the specified device interface.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Evaluate whether it is the same device.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.IsConnected(Ricoh.CameraController.DeviceInterface)
member.summary: Get connection status with the camera.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.Focus(System.Windows.Vector)
member.summary: Focus the camera with focus point.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.StartCapture(System.Boolean)
member.param: Focus the camera before capture. Default value is True

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.GetCaptureSettings(System.Collections.Generic.List{Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureSetting})
member.summary: Get the capture setting of the camera.
member.param: Specify the capture setting you want to get. Result is saved here

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.SetCaptureSettings(System.Collections.Generic.List{Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureSetting})
member.summary: Set the capture setting of the camera.
member.param: Specify the capture setting you want to set

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.GetCameraDeviceSettings(System.Collections.Generic.List{Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDeviceSetting})
member.param: Specify the camera device setting you want to get. Result is saved here

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.SetCameraDeviceSettings(System.Collections.Generic.List{Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDeviceSetting})
member.param: Specify the camera device setting you want to set

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.Storages
member.summary: Information on the storage of the camera.

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice.Images
member.summary: Image information list. Image list is updated automatically while connected in the background.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraEventListener
member.summary: Event listener receiving notification from the camera device.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraEventListener.ImageAdded(Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice,Ricoh.CameraController.CameraImage)
member.summary: The image has been added. You can transfer image data faster than stored CameraImage.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraEventListener.ImageStored(Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice,Ricoh.CameraController.CameraImage)
member.summary: The image has been stored in storage.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraEventListener.CaptureComplete(Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice,Ricoh.CameraController.Capture)
member.param: Image object that has been shot

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraEventListener.DeviceDisconnected(Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice,Ricoh.CameraController.DeviceInterface)
member.summary: The camera device has been disconnected. It will be notified when the cable is pulled out or the main unit is turned off. If you disconnect (CameraDevice.Disconnect) yourself, it will not be notified.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraEventListener.LiveViewFrameUpdated(Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice,System.Byte[])
member.summary: The live view frame data has been updated.
member.param: Binary data of the live view frame

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraEventListener.CaptureSettingsChanged(Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDevice,System.Collections.Generic.List{Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureSetting})
member.summary: The capture settings has been changed.

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraStatus.CurrentCapture
member.summary: Current capture status. It is only updated when captured by using capture function of this SDK. (If captured by pushing shutter button, it is not updated.)

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDeviceSetting
member.summary: Basic class of camera device settings. Derived classes of this class are prepared for various camera device settings. An instance of not this class but the derived classes are used.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDeviceSetting.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether some other setting values is "equal to" this one.
member.returns: Comparison result. True if they match

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDeviceSettingValue
member.summary: Basic interface regarding camera device setting values.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDeviceSettingValue.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Equivalent evaluation of setting values of camera.
member.returns: Comparison result. True if they match

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureSetting
member.summary: Basic class of capture setting. Derived classes of this class are prepared for various settings. An instance of not this class but the derived classes are used.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureSetting.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether some other setting values is "equal to" this one.
member.returns: Comparison result. True if they match

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureSetting.AvailableSettings
member.summary: Available capture settings value. A list of valid setting values that varies depending on the state and settings of the camera.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureSettingValue
member.summary: Basic interface regarding capture setting values.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureSettingValue.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Equivalent evaluation of setting values of capture.
member.returns: Comparison result. True if they match

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.LargeBest
member.summary: Large Image Size, Best Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.LargeBetter
member.summary: Large Image Size, Better Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.LargeGood
member.summary: Large Image Size, Good Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.MediumBest
member.summary: Medium Image Size, Best Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.MediumBetter
member.summary: Medium Image Size, Better Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.MediumGood
member.summary: Medium Image Size, Good Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.SmallBest
member.summary: Small Image Size, Best Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.SmallBetter
member.summary: Small Image Size, Better Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.SmallGood
member.summary: Small Image Size, Good Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.ExtraSmallBest
member.summary: Extra Small Image Size, Best Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.ExtraSmallBetter
member.summary: Extra Small Image Size, Better Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.StillImageQuality.ExtraSmallGood
member.summary: Extra Small Image Size, Good Image Quality

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.CaptureState.Complete
member.summary: All processing such as saving due to capture is completed.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.Capture
member.summary: Class for handling camera capture information.

member.name: F:Ricoh.CameraController.ErrorCode.Forbidden
member.summary: It was rejected by the camera state or request conditions.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.Error
member.summary: Error information. The response (Response) result is returned as an error if the method of the interface fails in the body state or for some reason.

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.Error.Message
member.summary: Error Details. Text for debugging. In case of USB(MTP) error, it contains MTP response code and its message.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.Response
member.summary: Response to request. If returning interface-specific properties, the Response class is extended.

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.Response.Errors
member.summary: Error information. Errors.Count becomes 0 if there is no error.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.StartCaptureResponse
member.summary: Response to request including the capture information.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.StorageListImagesState
member.summary: Acquisition status of image information list in storage.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraStorage
member.summary: Information on the storage of the camera device.

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraStorage.ListImagesState
member.summary: Acquisition status of image information list in storage.

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraStorage.Images
member.summary: Image information list. Image list is updated automatically while connected in the background.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraImage
member.summary: Class for handling with image information and image data.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraImage.GetData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Get the image in the camera device.
member.param: Image data stream. If you specify FileStream etc., data will be written.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraImage.GetThumbnail(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Get the thumbnail image in the camera device.
member.param: Image data stream. If you specify FileStream etc., data will be written.

member.name: M:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraImage.Delete
member.summary: Delete the image in the camera device.

member.name: P:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraImage.Exists
member.summary: Whether or not the entity of the image exists.

member.name: T:Ricoh.CameraController.CameraDeviceDetector
member.summary: Class for detecting connectable camera devices. Currently, only USB connection (MTP) is supported and can be detected.
